name: Warrior (kaungkaung4T)
description: Warrior is a mini video game. In this game, enemies will follow warrior until warrior die, if warrior was hit, game will end. But warrior can use enter and space to use attack and spell. Enter for attack and space for spell. Attack only need to hit once but spell need twice. If enemies were hit by spell, they will reach away from warrior. After hitting them twice, they will die. If warrior can survive, score will continually count. Enemies respawn times and locations are random.
